00010 const char *EagleLogger_DefaultLogLocation = "/tmp/eagledb.log";
00011 
00012 void EagleLogger_Delete(EagleLogger *logger)
00013 {
00014     if(NULL == logger) {
00015         return;
00016     }
00017     
00018     if(NULL != logger->out && stderr != logger->out && stdout != logger->out) {
00019         fclose(logger->out);
00020         logger->out = NULL;
00021     }
00022     
00023     EagleLock_Delete(logger->logLock);
00024     EagleLoggerEvent_Delete(logger->lastEvent);
00025     EagleMemory_Free(logger);
00026 }
00027 
00028 void EagleLogger_reset(EagleLogger *logger)
00029 {
00030     EagleLoggerEvent_Delete(logger->lastEvent);
00031     logger->lastEvent = NULL;
00032 }
00033 
00034 EagleLogger* EagleLogger_New(FILE *out)
00035 {
00036     EagleLogger *logger = (EagleLogger*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLogger_New.1", 1000);
00037     if(NULL == logger) {
00038         return NULL;
00039     }
00040     
00041     logger->totalMessages = 0;
00042     logger->logLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00043     logger->out = out;
00044     logger->lastEvent = NULL;
00045     
00046     return logger;
00047 }
00048 
00049 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_LastEvent()
00050 {
00051     return EagleLogger_lastEvent(EagleLogger_Get());
00052 }
00053 
00054 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_lastEvent(EagleLogger *logger)
00055 {
00056     if(NULL == logger) {
00057         return NULL;
00058     }
00059     return logger->lastEvent;
00060 }

00062 FILE* EagleLogger_GetLogFile(const char *location)
00063 {
00064     FILE *logFile = fopen(location, "a");
00065     if(NULL == logFile) {
00066         /*fprintf(stderr, "Unable to open log file for writing '%s'.", location);*/
00067         logFile = stderr;
00068     }
00069     
00070     return logFile;
00071 }
00072 
00073 EagleLogger* EagleLogger_Get(void)
00074 {
00075     static EagleLogger *EagleLogger_Logger = NULL;
00076     static EagleLock *lock = NULL;
00077     
00078     /* this function must be synchronized */
00079     if(NULL == lock) {
00080         lock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00081     }
00082     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(lock);
00083     
00084     /* initialise if its not started */
00085     if(NULL == EagleLogger_Logger) {
00086         /* use the default log location */
00087         FILE *logFile = EagleLogger_GetLogFile(EagleLogger_DefaultLogLocation);
00088         
00089         EagleLogger_Logger = EagleLogger_New(logFile);
00090     }
00091     
00092     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(lock);
00093     return EagleLogger_Logger;
00094 }

00096 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_log(EagleLogger* logger, EagleLoggerSeverity severity, char *message)
00097 {
00098     EagleLoggerEvent *event = EagleLoggerEvent_New(severity, message);
00099     EagleLogger_logEvent(logger, event);
00100     return event;
00101 }
00102 
00103 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverity severity, char *message)
00104 {
00105     return EagleLogger_log(EagleLogger_Get(), severity, message);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void EagleLogger_logEvent(EagleLogger* logger, EagleLoggerEvent *event)
00109 {
00110     char *timestamp;
00111     
00112     if(NULL == logger) {
00113         return;
00114     }
00115     if(NULL == event) {
00116         return;
00117     }
00118     
00119     /* this function must be synchronized */
00120     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(logger->logLock);
00121     
00122     /* pretty time */
00123     timestamp = ctime(&event->when);
00124     timestamp[strlen(timestamp) - 1] = '\0';
00125     
00126     if(NULL != logger->out) {
00127         fprintf(logger->out, "%s: [%s] %s\n", timestamp, EagleLoggerSeverity_toString(event->severity), event->message);
00128         fflush(logger->out);
00129     }
00130     ++logger->totalMessages;
00131     
00132     /* track most recent event */
00133     if(NULL != logger->lastEvent) {
00134         EagleLoggerEvent_Delete(logger->lastEvent);
00135     }
00136     logger->lastEvent = event;
00137     
00138     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(logger->logLock);
00139 }
00140 
00141 void EagleLogger_LogEvent(EagleLoggerEvent *event)
00142 {
00143     EagleLogger_logEvent(EagleLogger_Get(), event);
00144 }
